item.title: 2023-07-25 Issue 2: The Astonishing World of AI: A Deep Dive into the History, Applications, and Uses of Artificial Intelligence
item.description: I can't believe that AI is going to take over my job.

item.title: 2022-08-22: Issue 0: Jumping The Shark
item.description: This issue, we look at artwork from Twitter, what it's like to work at a Forest Service lookout, and some Shock Treatment! Oh my.
